effect.shortEffect: Prevents the first instance of battle damage.
effect.full: If this Pokémon is in its Disguised Form and takes damage from a move, it switches to its Busted Form and the damage is prevented. Other effects are not prevented. This ability cannot be copied or replaced. This ability only takes effect for Mimikyu.

description.sun-moon: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
description.sword-shield: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
